ordersPage.subtitle: Manage purchase orders from Chinese suppliers

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Purchase Order?
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{poNumber}}?
deleteConfirm.warning: This action cannot be undone. All order data will be permanently removed.

totals.note: * Additional costs will be added as order progresses

alerts.draft: This order is in Draft status. You can still edit the order items and details. Once you confirm the order, it will be locked and the PO number will be generated.
alerts.partiallyCompleted: This order has been partially completed. Some items were missing during receiving. The order has been processed with the received quantities and refunds have been auto-credited to the supplier wallet. The order is now locked and cannot be modified.
alerts.completed: This order has been completed. All status updates and inventory have been processed. The order is now locked and cannot be modified.

approveConfirm.title: Approve & Stock Order?
approveConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to approve {{poNumber}} and update inventory?
approveConfirm.warning: This will process the received items and update stock levels. This action cannot be undone.
approveConfirm.partialWarning: This order was partially completed with some missing items. Only the received quantities will be stocked.

draft.title: Confirm Order
draft.message: You are about to confirm this order. Please verify and set the CNY to BDT exchange rate. This rate will be used for all calculations and will update the currency table.

paymentConfirmed.title: Supplier Dispatching
paymentConfirmed.message: Supplier is dispatching the order. Please enter the international courier details.

warehouseReceived.title: Ship to Bangladesh
warehouseReceived.message: Shipment is being sent to Bangladesh. Please enter the lot number for tracking.

shippedBd.title: Arrived in Bangladesh
shippedBd.message: Goods have arrived in Bangladesh. Please enter the transport type and total shipping cost. This cost will be distributed across items by their price when calculating actual product cost.
shippedBd.shippingCostDescription: Total cost for this transport (will be distributed across items)

arrivedBd.title: In Transit to Bogura
arrivedBd.message: Goods are in transit to Bogura. Please enter the BD courier tracking number.

summary.title: Receiving Summary
summary.manualReviewWarning: ⚠️ Lost percentage exceeds 10% threshold. Refund of {{lostValue}} BDT requires manual review.
summary.partialWarning: ⚠️ Some items are missing ({{lostUnits}} units). Order will be marked as Partially Completed and refund of {{lostValue}} BDT will be auto-credited to supplier wallet.
summary.foundItemsInfo: ✓ {{foundUnits}} extra units received. Found items reduce cost proportionally.
summary.autoCreditSuccess: ✓ Lost percentage within 10% threshold. Refund will be auto-credited to supplier wallet.

extraCost.label: Extra Cost (BDT)
extraCost.description: Additional shipping, handling, or customs costs. Will be distributed across items by value ratio.

shippingCost.label: Shipping Cost (BDT)
shippingCost.description: Total shipping cost from China to Bangladesh. Will be distributed across received items by value ratio.

costAdjustment.title: Cost Adjustment (Lost Items Distributed)
costAdjustment.itemBreakdown: Lost items value ({{lostValue}} BDT) has been distributed across {{receivedUnits}} received units. Adjustment per unit: ৳ {{adjustmentPerUnit}}

costDistribution.title: Cost Distribution Method
costDistribution.description: Extra cost is distributed across items based on their received value ratio (china_price × received_quantity). Final unit cost = china_price + (extra_cost ÷ received_quantity)
